scripts.dev: npm run db:start && concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.db:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
